thread.section_title: Hotel Sezz Paris - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Friendly design hotel
thread.title_full: Friendly design hotel - Review of Hotel Sezz Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: roseglobe
title: Friendly design hotel
text: Pleasant welcome and stay thanks to the good friendly attitude of the staff and the fact that the hotel is small and conceived as a house (in a really beautiful Parisian block). Some minor improvements in the room would be helpful such like more toiletries (e.g. body lotion or shower cap) and stronger light in the room but it does not affect the overall quality of the stay. Breakfast not so rich in assortment but good in quality. The area outside does not offer much in terms of restaurants and entertainment (but the stunning view of La Tour Eiffel) but a convenient bus stop is there to quickly reach the other areas of Paris
